title: Chintz Fragment, 1750–1800
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 2 reds, brown and black applied by pen and brush.  Madder dyed. Blue applied over resist. Yellow applied by brush (chintz).
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 20.5 x 36 cm (8 1/16 x 14 3/16 in.)
description: Curving ribbons and floral stripes with butterflies among the flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Fragment, 1750–1800.
1750–1800. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 2 reds, brown and black applied by pen and brush.  Madder dyed. Blue applied over resist. Yellow applied by brush (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-46.
